ygData.subject: Re: Gone for three days
ygData.msgSnippet: Lunarpine picks up the message from Perndabot, he scans the area for the coordinates and swiftly moves toward them. He didn t know if the Maximal was Shadow

Lunarpine picks up the message from Perndabot, he scans the area for 
the coordinates and swiftly moves toward them. He didn't know if the 
Maximal was Shadow Wing or not under the circumstanaes he assumed it 
was.

"Lunarpine to base, we have a Maximal in destress, I'm sending the 
location now. Awaiting further orders."

To the Pit with orders, he thought as he sprinted across the 
landscape in the direction of the Predicons message. A fellow Maximal 
was in trouble, and there'd be Unicron to pay if it was harmed.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> I'll be out camping with family untill sunday, so I wouldn't be 
able to post.
> 
> ::Zardus/DevilDuer/Perndabot/Reptilica/Bloodystrike::
> 
> Zardus flies through the forest, looking around. He frowns. 
Something was 
> wrong, he could feel it. He looks down at his hand, seeing that it 
was half 
> transparent. No! It was happening again.
> 
> "I'll be gone for a few days," he says over his comm-link to the 
Alliance, 
> "Nemesis is in charge untill I get back."
> 
> He turns to Nemesis. "Finish the meeting with Panzertron. Try to 
recruit him."
> 
> With that, Zardus phases out, ready to phase back in in several 
days.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> In his quarters, DevilDuer turns around in his chair. He was not 
feeling 
> well. Stumbling across the room, he falls on his bed. With a flash, 
DevilDuer 
> is gone (for a few days).
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Perndabot spins around, looking at the sky. He could swear 
something had just 
> flown over him.
> 
> "Night vision," he tells his internal computer, his optics changing 
color. He 
> looks around, seeing a bird. That was it. Perndabot lifts his gun, 
his optics 
> widening when he looks at his arm, seeing through it. He growls. 
Not again!
> 
> "There is a Maximal at my coordinates," he says over his comm-link, 
the 
> device accidently transmitting that message over all frequences, 
then sending 
> the coordinates.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Reptilica and Bloodystrike drop off the energon they had mined in 
the cargo 
> hold. Reptilica smiles. "That's 200k of energon."
> 
> Bloodystrike growls. "I hate mining."
> 
> With a flash, the two dissapear.
